data.name: Don't Starve Together: Hallowed Nights Survivors Chest, Part III
data.detailed_description:
Hallowed Nights Survivors Chest, Part III

Their spooky getups now complete,
The time has come to trick or treat,
And revel in the spooks and frights
Of yet another Hallowed Nights!

Includes
  • The Chatterbox Chest
  • The Little Sinker Chest
  • The Tree Hugger Chest
  • The Wolfman Chest
  • The Wormwood O'Lantern Chest
data.about_the_game:
Hallowed Nights Survivors Chest, Part III

Their spooky getups now complete,
The time has come to trick or treat,
And revel in the spooks and frights
Of yet another Hallowed Nights!

Includes
  • The Chatterbox Chest
  • The Little Sinker Chest
  • The Tree Hugger Chest
  • The Wolfman Chest
  • The Wormwood O'Lantern Chest
data.short_description: The final installment in the trilogy! This Hallowed Nights Chest contains skins for: Walter, Wolfgang, Wormwood, Woodie, and Wurt.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion (OSX 10.7.X)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
